text: Knowledge Malusi Nkanyezi Gigaba MP, popularly known just as Malusi Gigaba (born 30 August 1971) is a South African politician. He is the current Minister of Home Affairs of The Republic of South Africa since 27 February 2018.https://m.news24.com/SouthAfrica/News/gigaba-fights-for-his-political-life-20180414 | Gigaba fights for his political life | News24https://www.sahistory.org.za/people/malusi-nkanyezi-gigaba | Malusi Nkanyezi Gigaba | South African History Online ==References== Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:South African politicians
title: Malusi Gigaba
